instructions: Reduce ¾ cup coconut milk until thick and coconut oil starts to separate. Add the curry paste and sauté for about 2 minutes until aromatic. Add chicken thigh and stir to mix with the paste. Add chicken stock, remaining coconut milk, palm sugar, and fish sauce. Add bruised makrut lime leaves and simmer for 10-15 minutes until chicken is fork tender. Add bamboo shoots and bring to a boil. Taste and adjust seasoning. Add Thai basil and serve with jasmine rice.
